nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex

Class ComplexFieldUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex.ComplexFieldUtil

  • public class ComplexFieldUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Some utility functions for dealing with complex field names.

      • usingOldFieldNames

        public static boolean usingOldFieldNames()
        Are we using the old field names?
        Returns:
        true if we are, false if not

      • setFieldNameSeparators

        public static void setFieldNameSeparators(boolean avoidSpecialChars)
        Set what field name separators to use.
        Parameters:
        avoidSpecialChars - if true, use only standard identifier characters for the separators. If false, use special chars %, @, #.

      • setFieldNameSeparators

        public static void setFieldNameSeparators(boolean avoidSpecialChars,
                          boolean oldVersion)
        Set what field name separators to use. Used for backwards compatibility; will eventually be removed.
        Parameters:
        avoidSpecialChars - if true, use only standard identifier characters for the separators. If false, use special chars %, @, #.
        oldVersion - if true, use the old naming scheme.

      • bookkeepingField

        public static java.lang.String bookkeepingField(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                java.lang.String propName,
                                java.lang.String bookkeepName)
        Construct a complex field bookkeeping subfield name.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - the base field name
        propName - the property name, or null if this is bookkeeping for the whole complex field
        bookkeepName - name of the bookkeeping value
        Returns:
        the combined complex field name

      • bookkeepingField

        public static java.lang.String bookkeepingField(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                java.lang.String bookkeepName)
        Construct a complex field bookkeeping subfield name.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - the base field name
        bookkeepName - name of the bookkeeping value
        Returns:
        the combined complex field name

        Construct a complex field property name.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - the base field name
        propName - the property name
        altName - the alternative name
        Returns:
        the combined complex field name

        altName - the alternative name

public static java.lang.String fieldName(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                    java.lang.String propName)
        Deprecated. replace with either propertyField or bookkeepingField
        Construct a complex field name from its component parts.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - the base field name
        propName - the property name
        Returns:
        the combined complex field name

      • fieldName

        @Deprecated
public static java.lang.String fieldName(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                    java.lang.String propName,
                                    java.lang.String altName)
        Deprecated. replace with either propertyField or bookkeepingField
        Construct a complex field name from its component parts.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - the base field name
        propName - the property name
        altName - the alternative name
        Returns:
        the combined complex field name

      • split

        @Deprecated
public static java.lang.String[] split(java.lang.String fieldPropAltName)
        Deprecated. Not used anywhere, superseded by getNameComponents()
        Split a complex field name into its component parts: base name, property name, and alternative. The last two are both optional; either or both may be present. Example: the name "contents__lemma_ALT_s" will be split into "contents", "lemma" and "s".
        Parameters:
        fieldPropAltName - the field name
        Returns:
        the component parts base name, property name and alternative. Missing parts will be empty strings.

      • getNameComponents

        public static java.lang.String[] getNameComponents(java.lang.String luceneFieldName)
        Gets the different components of a complex field property (alternative) name.
        Parameters:
        luceneFieldName - the Lucene index field name, with possibly a property and/or alternative added
        Returns:
        an array of size 1-4, containing the field name, and optionally the property name, alternative name and bookkeeping field name. Property name may be null if this is a main bookkeeping field. Alternative name may be null if this is a bookkeeping field or if it indicates the main property (not an alternative).

      • getBaseName

        public static java.lang.String getBaseName(java.lang.String luceneFieldName)
        Gets the base complex field name from a Lucene index field name. So "contents" and "contents__pos" would both yield "contents".
        Parameters:
        luceneFieldName - the Lucene index field name, with possibly a property added
        Returns:
        the base complex field name

      • getAlternative

        @Deprecated
public static java.lang.String getAlternative(java.lang.String fieldPropAltName)
        Deprecated. use getNameComponents
        Get the "alternative" part of the complex field property. An alternative of a property is, for example, a case-sensitive version of the property. For the alternatives "contents_ALT_s" or "contents__lemma_ALT_s" this method produces "s".
        Parameters:
        fieldPropAltName - the field plus property plus alternative name we want to get the alternative from
        Returns:
        the alternative name

      • getProperty

        @Deprecated
public static java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String fieldPropAltName)
        Deprecated. use getNameComponents
        Get the "property" part of the complex field property. For the field name "contents_lemma" or "contents__lemma_ALT_s" this method produces "lemma".
        Parameters:
        fieldPropAltName - the field plus property plus alternative name we want to get the alternative from
        Returns:
        the alternative name

      • isAlternative

        public static boolean isAlternative(java.lang.String fieldPropAltName,
                    java.lang.String altName)
        Checks if the given fieldName actually points to an alternative property (for example, a case-sensitive version of a property). Example: the fieldName "contents__lemma_ALT_s" indicates the "s" alternative of the "lemma" property of the "contents" complex field.
        Parameters:
        fieldPropAltName - the full fieldname, possibly including a property and/or alternative
        altName - the alternative to test for
        Returns:
        true if the fieldName indicates the specified alternative

      • isProperty

        @Deprecated
public static boolean isProperty(java.lang.String fieldPropAltName,
                            java.lang.String propName)
        Deprecated. use getNameComponents()
        Checks if the given fieldName actually points to the specified property (for example, the lemma or the POS of the original token). Example: the fieldName "contents__lemma" indicates the "lemma" property of the "contents" complex field. Field names may also include an "alternative", for example a case-sensitive version. For example, "contents__lemma_ALT_s" is the "s" alternative of the "lemma" property. However, alternatives are not tested for in this method, just the property name.
        Parameters:
        fieldPropAltName - the full fieldname, possibly including a property and/or alternative
        propName - the property to test for
        Returns:
        true if the fieldName indicates the specified alternative

      • mainPropertyField

        public static java.lang.String mainPropertyField(IndexStructure structure,
                                 java.lang.String fieldName)

        public static java.lang.String getDefaultMainAlternativeName()

      • isMainAlternativeNameless

        public static boolean isMainAlternativeNameless()

      • _setMainPropertyNameless

        public static void _setMainPropertyNameless(boolean b)
        Don't call this yourself. It is called by IndexStructure in case it detects the index has nameless main properties. Will eventually be removed.
        Parameters:
        b - true iff main property is nameless

      • _setMainAlternativeNameless

        public static void _setMainAlternativeNameless(boolean b)
        Don't call this yourself. It is called by IndexStructure in case it detects the index has nameless alternatives. Will eventually be removed.
        Parameters:
        b - true iff main alternative is nameless
